title: Breathe deeply.
description: Inhale and feel your chest expand. Hold the breath gingerly, like an egg in your hands. Slowly release it back into the world. Repeat. Repeat. Repeat.

title: Close your eyes. Take a journey.
description: Where do you want to be? How does it sound? How does it smell? How does it feel? Remember and reflect.

title: Window.
description: All around you is beauty, if you wish to see it. Gaze out the nearest window and choose to see that beauty.

title: Listen.
description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8CnhcGpmH9Y

title: Plan.
description: Where have you come from? Where are you going? Recall your joys. Reaffirm your ambitions.

title: Walk.
description: Choose to take a walk. Let the sights and sounds sink into your body.

title: Exercise.
description: Do 10 pushups. Take a moment to rest. Do 10 pushups. Another rest. 10 more pushups.

title: Exercise.
description: Find stairs and climb them. Go back down. Then climb them again.

title: Exercise.
description: Jumping jacks, one minute. Then a minute's rest. Then another minute of jumping jacks.

title: Plank
description: Hold a plank for as long as you can. Then do it again. And again.

title: Plank.
description: Hold a plank for at least 30 seconds! Do this at least 3 times!

title: Coffee shop.

title: Deep Breathing
description: Inhale deeply with nose, slow till your lungs are filled up, then gently exhale from the mouth

title: Ocean sunset.
description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bQIFonw98z4

title: Alternative Nostril Breathing
description: Close right side of the nostril with thumb, and Inhale deeply with other side of nose, then gently cover the left nosetril with the index finger and release the thumb to exhale from the right nostril. Do this excercise alternatively

title: Jump!
description: Stand up, and reach as high into the sky as you can. Leap!

title: Stand with one leg
description: Close your eye and stand with only one leg on the ground

title: Stretch!
description: Stand and stretch. Loosen your shoulders. Loosen your back. Slowly, but with purpose.

title: Be charmed by bewildered dogs.
description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VEQXeLjY9akw

title: sun-salutation
description: Stand up straight, facing the sun, stand up stright and do sun salutation. these postures are a good way to keep the body in shape and the mind calm and healthy.

title: A seven-minute high-intensity workout.
description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RgXQ7Cqmulg

title: Brisk walking
description: Go for a brisk walk, walk fast but do not run.

title: Comedy show
description: Watch your favorite comedy show.

title: Tai Chi
description: Do Tai Chi

title: Dance
description: Dance with your favorite party beats

title: single-pointed meditation
description: Take any visual object and focus on that for 5 minutes without wandering your thoughts.

title: analytical meditation
description: Close your eyes and take any subject of your choice, observe your thoughts about that and reason about why you think like that.

title: talk to loved ones
description: Go and talk to your friend who makes you happy.
